name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
dialogue: Insaan ko dibbe mein sirf tab hona chahiye,

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
dialogue: Seize the day my friend, pehle is din ko poori tarah jiyo,
hiddenPart: phir chalis ke bare mein sochna

name: Tu Jhooti Main Makkar
dialogue: Aaj kal relationship mein ghusna aasaan hai, usme se nikalna mushkil.
hiddenPart: Rishta jodna aasaan hai, todna mushkil

name: Chup Chup Ke
dialogue: Toh ise ghar kyun bolte hain,
hiddenPart: jila kyun nahi ghoshit kr dete

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
dialogue: Main udna chahta hun, daudna chahta hun, girna bhi chahta hun.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
dialogue: Mujhe tumse pyaar ho jaaega, phir se.
hiddenPart: Aur tumhe nahi hoga, phir se

name: Laapataa Ladies
dialogue: Ek baar ghunghat le liya, toh aage nahin,

name: Wake Up Sid
dialogue: Goals paane ki khushi tabhi mehsoos hoti hai,
hiddenPart: jab use kisi ke saath share kar sako

name: Dil Chahta Hai
dialogue: Mujhe yakeen hai ki main sirf isliye janma hun ki tumse pyaar kar sakun, tum sirf isliye
hiddenPart: ki ek din meri ban jao
